gelball.name: Ball of Gel
gelball.desc: Compressed gelatin, has distinctive healing properties.

hpostionsm.name: Small Draught of Health
hpostionsm.desc: A small healing potion for all your small healing needs.

hpostionmd.name: Average Draught of Health
hpostionmd.desc: A slightly bigger vial of liquid health, tastes slightly of toenail fungus.

hpostionlg.name: Large Draught of Health
hpostionlg.desc: Capable of healing almost all wounds, the toe fungus taste is undeniable in this potion.

spostionsm.name: Small Draught of Stamina
spostionsm.desc: Restores a small amount of stamina with an invigorating serum and a hint of lemon.

spostionmd.name: Medium Draught of Stamina
spostionmd.desc: Restores a moderate amount of stamina with an even more invigorating serum and a dash of... lime?

spostionlg.name: Large Draught of Stamina
spostionlg.desc: A very invigorating potion which restores a lot of stamina but has a rather odd taste.

mpostionsm.name: Small Vial of Magic
mpostionsm.desc: This potion glows faintly when exposed to light.

mpostionlg.name: Large Vial of Magic
mpostionlg.desc: Feel the magic coursing through your veins as you sip on this delux magical vial.

whpoison.name: Weak Health Poison
whpoison.desc: This poison has no description; simply because it is poisonous.

hsafgpoison.name: Hella Strong As Fuck God Poison
hsafgpoison.desc: This poison has no description; simply because it is poisonous.
